'''Genesis Crystals''' are the paid currency in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

==Info==
'''Genesis Crystals''' are the premium special currency in ''Genshin Impact''. They can only be obtained through in-game purchases. These crystals can be converted to {{Item|Primogem|text=Primogems|30}} on a 1:1 ratio.

'''Note:''' Accounts created using a mobile device will only be able to top-up on mobile. Accounts created on PC or PlayStation may use other platforms.

Purchases can only be made from the same platform as the device you used to register. This is because on iOS, Android, and PlayStation, Apple/Google/Sony gets a cut of profits made from in-app purchases, and these marketplaces discourage the selling of in-app purchases in a way that bypasses this cut (as Epic Games did with Fortnite, resulting in their app being pulled from the App and Play stores).
